item.description:
Cinema City at the Palace has released the next few weekends' schedule for Cinema Classics. These movies cost only $5 per ticket ($4 for Criterion Club members) and show at 11:00am on Saturday and Sunday. I will choose one of the days and if you can't go on that day and want to go the other day, feel free. I may or may not be going; some weekends I am out of town.  So look for each other!

 

"The Philadelphia Story" (1940) - Katherine Hepburn, Cary Grant, and James Stewart star in this classic.  "When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage...." well, to say any more would be telling!  The iMDB summary doesn't begin to cover it.

 

The films are shown without previews (bonus!) so I set the meetup time fifteen minutes early. If you get there after 11:00am you might miss the start of the movie.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Cinema Classics - "The Philadelphia Story"
